name: Super Eden Jumper
description:
Get to the top of the Tree of the knowledge of good and evil to kick Serpent's ass, but be sure not to snack on some forbidden fruit. It's not just temptaion this time, the sneaky snake is throwing damn apples at you:

  • Press Mouse1 to activate Eve;
  • While holding Mouse1 strech and choose the angel for her to jump
  • Jump close to the Snake to bite his head off
  • Avoid the forbidden fruits!
